name: Tax Taker: ROCK ON!!!
description:
TO EVERY COIN YOU EARN THERE IS A PRICE AND HE IS GONNA TAKE IT.

WITH TWO GIANT SWORDS!

Slash throu bystanders to collect their taxes TO THE RYTHM

ROCK RYTHM

Who is he?

A TAX TAKER!!!

9 diffrent maps

AND TONS OF TAXES TO COLLECT

Left: A,Q,Left Arrow, LMP

Right: E,D, Right Arrow, RMP

Jump, Space Bar, W, Up Arrow

*Additional notes*

-Due to lack of testing the "Double speed mode" is disabled in this version of a build

- Unreal Engine 4 #UE4JAM is a button that unlocks all 9 levels, it is there but don't use if you don't have to

- I know that usage of logos /  trademarks is prohibited but I have recived a information from official Unreal Engine 4 Twitter that usage of Unreal Engine related logo is fine. If this is incorect please let me know. I have version w/o the logo ready to go
